name: Across the River Styx (kevinbchen)
description:
"Remember little one, our job is to provide comfort to these newly reaped souls as they journey across the Styx." 

Play as a reaper-in-training and help travelling souls as they cross the River Styx. Created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare Jam 52 (Theme: "Harvest").

Controls

Use the arrow keys to move, shift to sprint, and space to grab and drop items.

Instructions

Walk up to each ghost to find out their needs. Comfort them by giving them their wants - food for those that are hungry, a scarf for those that are cold, and a band-aid for those that are hurt.

Band-aids are available from an item box (to the right of the bridge), but you'll need to cook spaghetti by combining tomatoes and pasta at the stove, and knit scarves from yarn at the sewing table.
